common module¶

This module contains widely used functions including the Joinmarket Wallet classes.

class common.AbstractWallet[source]¶

Bases: object

Abstract wallet for use with JoinMarket Mostly written with class Wallet in mind, the default JoinMarket HD wallet.

Return the private key for the address addr.

get_new_addr(mixing_depth, forchange)[source]¶

Returns the next unused address at the mixdepth mixing_depth and the change branch (1/0) forchange. The index pointer is moved forward by 1.

get_receive_addr(mixing_depth)[source]¶

Return the next address on the “receive” branch for this mixing depth.

get_utxos_by_mixdepth()[source]¶

returns a list of utxos sorted by different mix levels

read_wallet_file_data(filename)[source]¶
remove_old_utxos(tx)[source]¶

Remove utxos in the transaction tx from the wallet internal utxo list.

update_cache_index()[source]¶

Set the value of the index pointer at each mixdepth in the wallet file, so it can be picked up correctly on restart.

common.calc_cj_fee(ordertype, cjfee, cj_amount)[source]¶

Returns the actual coinjoin fee in satoshis given the ordertype (currently relorder or absorder), the cjfee parameter (which in some cases is a decimal ratio), and the actual coinjoin amount in satoshis.

common.cheapest_order_choose(orders, n, feekey)[source]¶

Return the cheapest order from the orders.

common.choose_orders(db, cj_amount, n, chooseOrdersBy, ignored_makers=[])[source]¶

Given the database of current orders db, the coinjoin amount cj_amount, an order choice algorithm function chooseOrdersBy and optionally a list of counterparties to ignore in ignore_makers, return a dict of chosen orders and the total coinjoin fee that would be applied in case this selection is accepted.

common.choose_sweep_orders(db, total_input_value, total_txfee, n, chooseOrdersBy, ignored_makers=[])[source]¶

choose an order given that we want to be left with no change i.e. sweep an entire group of utxos

solve for cjamount when mychange = 0 for an order with many makers, a mixture of absorder and relorder mychange = totalin - cjamount - total_txfee - sum(absfee) - sum(relfee*cjamount) => 0 = totalin - mytxfee - sum(absfee) - cjamount*(1 + sum(relfee)) => cjamount = (totalin - mytxfee - sum(absfee)) / (1 + sum(relfee))

common.chunks(d, n)[source]¶

Utility function to split the list d into n chunks.

common.debug(msg)[source]¶
common.debug_dump_object(obj, skip_fields=[])[source]¶

Print out the contents of a Python object. Useful for debugging. If sensitive info is contained, add it to the skip_fields argument to prevent printout.

Returns the correct magic byte for a pay to public key hash address.

Returns the correct magic byte for a pay to script hash address.

common.load_program_config()[source]¶

Load the configuration from the file joinmarket.cfg in the base directory (hardcoded). Check for required sections. If file is not present, create a default version.

common.pick_order(orders, n, feekey)[source]¶

Manually choose an order from the list orders.

common.rand_exp_array(lamda, n)[source]¶
common.rand_norm_array(mu, sigma, n)[source]¶
common.rand_pow_array(power, n)[source]¶
common.rand_weighted_choice(n, p_arr)[source]¶

Choose a value in 0..n-1 with the choice weighted by the probabilities in the list p_arr. Note that there will be some floating point rounding errors, but see the note at the top of this section.

common.select_gradual(unspent, value)[source]¶

UTXO selection algorithm for gradual dust reduction If possible, combines outputs, picking as few as possible of the largest utxos less than the target value; if the target value is larger than the sum of all smaller utxos, uses the smallest utxo larger than the value.

common.select_greediest(unspent, value)[source]¶

UTXO selection algorithm for speediest dust reduction Combines the shortest run of utxos (sorted by size, from smallest) which exceeds the target value; if the target value is larger than the sum of all smaller utxos, uses the smallest utxo larger than the target value.

common.select_greedy(unspent, value)[source]¶

UTXO selection algorithm for greedy dust reduction, but leaves out extraneous utxos, preferring to keep multiple small ones.

common.validate_address(addr)[source]¶
common.weighted_order_choose(orders, n, feekey)[source]¶

Algorithm for choosing the weighting function it is an exponential P(f) = exp(-(f - fmin) / phi) P(f) - probability of order being chosen f - order fee fmin - minimum fee in the order book phi - scaling parameter, 63% of the distribution is within

define number M, related to the number of counterparties in this coinjoin phi has a value such that it contains up to the Mth order unless M < orderbook size, then phi goes up to the last order
